biz.onomato.frskydash.sim

Class FileSimulatorThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • biz.onomato.frskydash.sim.FileSimulatorThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileSimulatorThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    simulator for iterating available files on a given path and providing this as input to the server. Can be used to iterate log files from previous test flights. thread start/stop http://stackoverflow.com/questions/680180/where-to-stop-destroy -threads-in-android-service-class
    Author:
    hcpl
